SEARCH

Class StarsAndStripes

java.lang.Object
StarsAndStripes
public class StarsAndStripes extends Object
Class Stars and Stripes will create 4 individual flags based on custom parameters. These flags have been calculated based on sizing, width height, number of stripes and number of stars with proper spacing and alignment. Contains 3 methods, main, drawFlag and drawStar.
Author:
Erick Ruiz

  • Method Details

    • drawFlag

      public static void drawFlag(int numStars, int numStripes, Graphics pen, int flagLeftX, int flagTopY, int flagWidth, int flagHeight)
      Method that will perform calculators for stripes, stripes height, Star Field Sizing, Star Sizing and orientation and will draw the graphics for the flag once calculations are completed. Will call drawStar to perform graphics of individual stars.
      Parameters:
      numStars - Number of Stars in Flag
      numStripes - Number of Stripes flag will have
      pen - Graphic object used for creating the flag components and graphics
      flagLeftX - Left Side on X axis of the Flag, Used for creating flag size
      flagTopY - Top of Y Axis of the flag, also used for creating the flag
      flagWidth - Overall width of the flag,
      flagHeight - Overall height of the flag

    • drawStar

      public static void drawStar(Graphics pen, int starLeftX, int starTopY, int starSize)
      Helper Method Used to create an individual Star, will calculate sizing and points first. Once points have been made, method will draw star.
      Parameters:
      pen - Graphic object used for creating the flag components and graphics
      starLeftX - Left Side of X axis of 5x5 grid used to make the star.
      starTopY - Top Side of Y axis of 5x5 grid used to make the star.
      starSize - int variable containing size of the star

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
